item.title: What are web webservers?
item.description: What is the Internet First ? The internet is a **wire** a actually buried in the ground it might be fiber optics copper or occasionally beam to satellites or through cell phone networks but the internet is simply a wire. The internet is useful because **two computers connected directly** to this wire can communicate a server is a special computer connected directly to the internet and **web pages** or **files** on that server’s **hard drive** every server has a unique **Internet Protocol** address or IP address just like a postal address IP addresses help computers find each other but since 72.
